beginner.text: How do you add up all numbers in cells A1 through A10?
What keyboard shortcut saves an Excel file?
How do you make text bold in Excel?
beginner.expected_answer: Select the text and press Ctrl+B or use the Bold button

beginner.text: What function counts the number of cells that contain numbers?
How do you select an entire column in Excel?
beginner.expected_answer: Click on the column header letter, or press Ctrl+Space when in the column

intermediate.text: Explain how VLOOKUP works and provide an example.
intermediate.expected_answer: VLOOKUP searches for a value in the first column of a table and returns a value in the same row from a specified column. Example: =VLOOKUP(A1,B:D,2,FALSE)

intermediate.text: How do you freeze panes in Excel?
intermediate.expected_answer: Select the cell below and to the right of where you want to freeze, then go to View > Freeze Panes

intermediate.text: What is the difference between relative and absolute cell references?
intermediate.expected_answer: Relative references (A1) change when copied, absolute references ($A$1) stay fixed, mixed references ($A1 or A$1) fix either column or row

intermediate.text: How would you remove duplicate values from a dataset?
intermediate.expected_answer: Select the data, go to Data tab, click Remove Duplicates, choose columns to check, click OK

intermediate.text: What does the IF function do and how do you use it?
intermediate.expected_answer: IF function performs logical tests and returns different values based on TRUE/FALSE. Syntax: =IF(condition, value_if_true, value_if_false)

advanced.text: How would you create a pivot table to analyze sales data by region?
advanced.expected_answer: Select data range, Insert > PivotTable, drag Region to Rows, drag Sales to Values area

advanced.text: Explain INDEX and MATCH functions and how they work together.
advanced.expected_answer: INDEX returns value from specific position, MATCH finds position. Together: =INDEX(return_array,MATCH(lookup_value,lookup_array,0)) provides flexible lookups

advanced.text: How do you use conditional formatting to highlight cells based on values?
advanced.expected_answer: Select range, Home > Conditional Formatting, choose rule type, set criteria, choose formatting

advanced.text: What are dynamic array formulas and how do they work?
advanced.expected_answer: Dynamic arrays return multiple values that spill to adjacent cells automatically. Use functions like FILTER, UNIQUE, SORT without Ctrl+Shift+Enter

advanced.text: How would you create a dashboard with interactive charts in Excel?
advanced.expected_answer: Use pivot tables/charts, add slicers for interactivity, organize on dashboard sheet, use data validation for dropdowns
